channel.title: [562] Ranged Glitch
channel.description:
It's wierd, ranging works but when you click to attack it makes you walk up next to the npc to attack them instead of actually being "Ranged". Also with melee attacking it'll walk up to them and you have to click attack again when next to them before it actually attacks. Just thought i'd throw that in see if i can nail two birds with one stone. I'm on the PainZone base.
rep ++ for helper :)

item.title: [562] Ranged Glitch
item.dc:creator: @eri0nn eri0nn
item.description:
@eri0nn wrote:

this is my problem too ! but it works on players . You can range from a distance with range or mage on players . butt not on NPC’s im working on that problem because i`m working in a server. If i will fix it i will make a tutorial.

Read full topic
